item.description:
Circle The City is a series of 3 events that will kick-off this summer to activate Boston's communities by connecting them through open streets and parks. A 2012 Urban Signature Project of the [America's Great Outdoors Initiative], Circle The City will entertain all ages through, walking tours, bike rides, hula hoop contests, kick-ball, yoga, dance performances, etc.
Come and support the initiative and get active on

June 24: Franklin Park kick-off with the Boston POPS brass ensemble
July 15: Open streets surrounding Franklin Park and Jamaica Pond
August 5: Open streets downtown along the Rose Kennedy Greenway

See you in the streets!
item.name: Circle The City
